## 🚀 About Me

I'm a passionate **Flutter Developer** from Pakistan 🇵🇰, with expertise in creating high-quality, professional applications. I love turning ideas into reality with clean, maintainable, and scalable code. As a 17-year-old developer, I believe in constant learning and growth. My journey in software development started with basic knowledge of **Java**, **XML**, **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, and now I specialize in Flutter.

## 🛠 My Current Focus

- 🌟 Building a **professional expense tracker app** using the **Stacked package**.
- 📊 Learning **database management** and integrating **Firebase** and **APIs** into my apps.
- 💻 Mastering **state management** in Flutter with a focus on clean architecture.

## 🏗 My Projects

- [Expense Tracker App](#): Professional UI built with Flutter and Stacked.
- [Other Projects](#): More coming soon!

## 🌱 Currently Learning

- Advanced **state management** concepts.
- Professional **UI/UX** design practices.
- **Database management** for robust app development.

## 🌟 Fun Fact

When I’m not coding, I enjoy exploring new ideas and engaging with the developer community.
